title: Stay Hidden!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Mari-chan, you still need to stay hidden. It looks like Onee-chan is dropping off her things now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari is tired of hiding already~. Can’t we just barge in Dia’s room and surprise her that way?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Y-, you can’t ~. It’s supposed to be a surprise that you’re staying over, Mari-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>But it’s not like it’s the first time I stayed over, so it wouldn’t really surprise her that much, would it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby will make sure it goes well, so it’s okay! Onee-chan will go to sleep as usual.... then Ruby wants you to jump out like bam!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>But Ruby, I’m worried because it’s quite showing on your face.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I-, it’s not showing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then, shall I test it? I’m going to give you a washi washi, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigii! T-, that is~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Look, it is showing. So Mari will just go out now~! I’ve been looking forward to today’s sleepover at the Kurosawa’s, after all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
